name: Awaiting Salvation
description:
Story

You are assigned to save a village from a contagious disease. You are their only hope to survive. Six people are waiting for you. You will receive the potions but these potions are not ready to use. You must find the complementary potions to prepare the cure. Get ready for the mission! You have been chosen by the King.

-Solve the puzzles and find the potions!
-Save the villagers and reveal the story!

Game features

-Classical first person perspective
-Single player
-Story driven-puzzle-adventure
-Unique puzzles
